Sarthak Gupta

About

I am presently working as a software developer at Intuit India, where I am working on one of their products known as QuickBooks Desktop Payroll. It has been a wonderful experience working at Intuit till now. :D

Other than my day job at Intuit, I am an active contributor in open source. Presently, I am working with an organization called elixir-cloud-aai which comes under the umbrella of organization called GA4GH. I was selected in Google Summer of Code under this organization and have stayed connected with it till date.

I graduated from my college Birla Institue of Techniology, Mesra in the year 2020. My college life was one of the best phases of my life which transformed me completely as a person. In college, I...

  • Participated in many hackathons (around 6-7) and have won a few of them including Microsoft Codefundo++.
  • Got selected for Google Summer of Code twice.
  • Was a part of two major coding clubs: IET and ACM, where I drove several major initiatives to improve the skills of coding community in college. In ACM I was the web master in my final year.
  • Was a DC admin, and a network administrator of entire college (with limited access :P)
  • Was a part of winning team of Apoorv Dramzest - Dramatics fest of college.

This is just an overview. If you would like to know more about my professional front, then checkout my LinkedIn profile.
